biotools.summary: Prediction and analysis of genomic islands in bacterial and archael genomes. It integrates four different genomic island prediction methods: IslandPick, IslandPath-DIMOB, SIGI-HMM, and Islander.

bioschemas.name: IslandViewer 4
bioschemas.summary: Prediction and analysis of genomic islands in bacterial and archael genomes. It integrates four different genomic island prediction methods: IslandPick, IslandPath-DIMOB, SIGI-HMM, and Islander.
